messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Kalli again
messages.msgSnippet: Hopefully this is just another delayed message to my inbox?  (I ve been having trouble with that lately... which I much prefer over 23 copies of the same
messages.messageBody:
Hopefully this is just another delayed message to my inbox? (I've been having trouble with that lately... which I much prefer over 23 copies of the same message!)

For the record, none of my stories qualify for this year's nominations... Fast Carriage was the first real story I wrote and I didn't begin posting it until January of this year (and I *think* the rules state they have to be posted before December 31, 2003). I had already decided to start dating my stories on my site just to be able to say that no matter how much we learn differently about the history, as of such-n--such a date, I was no longer going on new information, but now maybe I have another reason (one can always dream, ne?). And, though I don't know why anyone would want to know, but for the sake of any who haven't made the connection, phil/spiritus_saitou is the same nut as philalexandros.

Thank you, Kalli, for wanting to nominate it. I feel really honored and touched by your support of the story.

phil (who's always been a little "touched" in the head... BUT finally back to writing)
P.S. Thanks, Barb, for sending out the site URL! :-D

Kalli <kallipygia@...> wrote:
Barbara,

Can I bug you again? I went to her site but couldn't find her email address, which you have to have to nominate fics. Do you know her address?

Thanks!

Kalli

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] FYI: 2003 Rurouni Kenshin Readers' Choice Awards
messages.msgSnippet: I went to ff.net to get the URL for philalexandros Fast Carriage (SaitouxSano) fic, but it doesn t seem to be there anymore.  Does anyone know where this fic
messages.messageBody:
I went to ff.net to get the URL for philalexandros' Fast Carriage (SaitouxSano) fic, but it doesn't seem to be there anymore. Does anyone know where this fic went? Philalexandros, are you still on this list? Did you move all your fics somewhere else?

Kalli

The nomination process has started. You might check the shinsengumidb.com site for links to stories, as well as ff.net (http://www.fanfiction.net ). Be sure to read the nomination rules carefully... it can get tricky determining eligibility, unfortunately.

Let's get Saitou represented! :-D

http://www.tfme.net/rkrc/index.php

phil
